# Welcome to the September 29 AWS Platform Engineering Workshop

Prerequisites:

1. Set up your AWS Workshop Studio environment
2. Enter the hosted VSCode IDE
3. Go to <https://console.humanitec.dev> and register for an account and free org

```
hctl update runner dump-default \
  --set runner_configuration='{"type": "kubernetes", "cluster": {"cluster_data": {"certificate_authority_data": "", "server": "https://AD54D1925D1DDFF6D1A8B17333A65C0F.gr7.us-west-2.eks.amazonaws.com"}, "auth": {"service_account_token": "k8s-aws-v1."}}, "job": {"namespace": "default", "service_account": "default"}}' \
  --set state_storage_configuration='{"type": "kubernetes", "namespace": "default"}' --debug
```
